title: Low Priority Queue after a Remake
body: It would be nice if RIOT done something about the low priority queue where the game has ended due to a Remake, which in turn means that we have to wait again.  It does take the count down by one, but I feel it would be better if we are not placed in the queue again to wait.{{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
A remake is considered a whole game by the Low Priority Queue system, which is why your remaining number of games is reduced by one.

I know it's a little annoying to play 3 minutes of a game and then have to wait again, but considering it's a punishment I wouldn't expect it to be a pleasant experience.
